languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете явное отличие между фигурами спорщиков: старший выглядит истощенным, в отличие от гладколицего юноши. Голос молодого служителя мелодичен, как голос певца. Старец же говорит четко и звучно.{/n}

{n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете явное отличие между фигурами спорщиков: старший выглядит истощенным, в отличие от гладколицего юноши. Голос молодого служителя мелодичен, как голос певца. Старец же говорит четко и звучно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice a distinct difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the old priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has a singer's melodious voice, while the old man's voice is clear and powerful.{/n}

{n}You notice a distinct difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the old priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has a singer's melodious voice, while the old man's voice is clear and powerful.{/n}

{n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

{n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

{n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

{n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到这两个争吵的牧师有一点明显不同——年迈的牧师浑身满是疲态，与那个皮肤油光水滑的年轻人截然不同。此外，年轻的牧师嗓音如同歌手般悠扬，而年迈的牧师讲话清晰有力。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到这两个争吵的牧师有一点明显不同——年迈的牧师浑身满是疲态，与那个皮肤油光水滑的年轻人截然不同。此外，年轻的牧师嗓音如同歌手般悠扬，而年迈的牧师讲话清晰有力。{/n}

languages.text: {n}言い争っている二人の体格にははっきりとした違いがあることに気づく。老司祭の体は痩せこけており、つるりとした顔立ちの若者とは対照的だ。また、若い司祭は歌手のように滑らかで美しい声をしているのに対し、老司祭の話し方は明瞭で力強かった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}言い争っている二人の体格にははっきりとした違いがあることに気づく。老司祭の体は痩せこけており、つるりとした顔立ちの若者とは対照的だ。また、若い司祭は歌手のように滑らかで美しい声をしているのに対し、老司祭の話し方は明瞭で力強かった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adviertes una marcada diferencia en las complexiones de ambos hombres: el viejo presenta un aspecto demacrado, mientras que el otro tiene el rostro lampiño. Además, el sacerdote joven habla con la voz melodiosa de un cantante, pero el viejo se expresa con claridad y tono imperioso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adviertes una marcada diferencia en las complexiones de ambos hombres: el viejo presenta un aspecto demacrado, mientras que el otro tiene el rostro lampiño. Además, el sacerdote joven habla con la voz melodiosa de un cantante, pero el viejo se expresa con claridad y tono imperioso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tartışan adamların fizikleri arasında belirgin bir fark dikkatini çekiyor: Yaşlı olanın bedeni, pürüzsüz yüzlü genç olanın aksine çelimsiz. Ayrıca gencin şarkıcı gibi ahenkli bir sesi varken ihtiyarın sesi daha net ve gür çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tartışan adamların fizikleri arasında belirgin bir fark dikkatini çekiyor: Büyük olanın bedeni, pürüzsüz yüzlü küçük olanın aksine çelimsiz. Ayrıca küçüğün şarkıcı gibi ahenkli bir sesi varken büyüğün sesi daha net ve gür çıkıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez une différence de corpulence marquée entre les deux hommes qui se disputent : le corps du vieux prêtre est décharné, contrairement à celui de son coreligionnaire au visage lisse. En outre, le jeune prêtre a la voix mélodieuse d'un chanteur, tandis que la diction du vieil homme est claire et puissante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez une différence de corpulence marquée entre les deux hommes qui se disputent : le corps du vieux prêtre est décharné, contrairement à celui de son coreligionnaire au visage lisse. En outre, le jeune prêtre a la voix mélodieuse d'un chanteur, tandis que la diction du vieil homme est claire et puissante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst einen klaren Unterschied im Körperbau der streitenden Männer: Der ältere Priester ist abgemagert, im Gegensatz zu dem jungen mit seinem faltenlosen Gesicht. Außerdem hat der jünger Priester die melodische Stimme eines Sängers, während der alte Mann klar und kraftvoll spricht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a marked difference between the builds of the quarrelling men: the older priest's body is gaunt, unlike that of the smooth-faced youth. Also, the younger priest has the melodious voice of a singer, while the old man's speech is clear and powerful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst einen klaren Unterschied im Körperbau der streitenden Männer: Der ältere Priester ist abgemagert, im Gegensatz zu dem jungen mit seinem faltenlosen Gesicht. Außerdem hat der jünger Priester die melodische Stimme eines Sängers, während der alte Mann klar und kraftvoll spricht.{/n}
